Name: Mirage
Phase0Description: The statue seemed to have been sealing away an angry spirit. Interacting with the statue has released it. I must defeat the spirit.
Phase16Description: I found a strange, mirage-like figure in the desert. It seemed to be leading me somewhere.
Phase3Description: The mirage-like figure has led me to an ancient statue. I should inspect it.
Toast: A strange figure beckons for you to follow through the desert.
